h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Fight
content: The foes will also use each half of the iron ball as a shield of sorts. You will not do any damage to them by hitting this shield, so try to get behind them whenever they are shielding themselves. They are both armed with weapons as well as the dangerous ball, so keep an eye out for their swings and watch your back for the other enemy at all times.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The foes will also use each half of the iron ball as a shield of sorts. You will not do any damage to them by hitting this shield, so try to get behind them whenever they are shielding themselves. They are both armed with weapons as well as the dangerous ball, so keep an eye out for their swings and watch your back for the other enemy at all times.
